flat_items.setting.enabled.tooltip: With this option enabled, items will be rendered in 2D and they will always face the player.
flat_items.setting.affect_3d.tooltip: By default, only 2D items are affected. This option also renders 3D models (such as blocks) as flat.
flat_items.setting.render_sides.tooltip: Renders the sides of items whilst still making them face the player. Makes for a great 3D effect!
flat_items.configuration.title: Flat Items / Settings
